attributes.action: Completely abolish second homes and allowances for MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be instead a number of publicly owned flats which MP's could use when working in London, furnished and maintained by the taxpayer, eliminating the need for any allowances. These flats could be funded from the profits made when MP's sell their current second homes.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
